Name: Mexicano (Hot)
Ingredients: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: POUR tequila and liqueur into warmed glass and top with coffee. FLOAT cream over drink.
Review: A spicy, flavour-packed hot coffee. Lightly whip or simply shake cream in container before pouring over the bowl of a spoon. It also helps if the cream is gently warmed.
Nutrition: One serving of Mexicano (Hot) contains 104 calories
